name: Jackie'sHomeFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A Skill Flash Briefing to help you Sell your home, produced by Jackie Lynaugh, “Realtor with a Heart of Gold.”

The iBuyer Program is for the convenience for sellers ready to sell their home. A quick overview of news and other content such as selling your home for cash, the market, financing, and new listing on the market. A flash briefing skill provides content for buyer’s and seller’s needs. Today, real estate moves fast.

Buyers and Sellers will discover the latest and greatest real estate news, real-time financial information, and market data. Get a neighborhood snapshot anywhere in the USA, out and about area of interest, market updates, and how to add value to the largest investment in your lifetime, Your Home. 

Try saying things like:
“Alexa, ask Realtor with a Heart of Gold, what’s selling.” 
“Alexa, ask Realtor with a Heart of Gold, neighborhood snapshot.”
“Alexa, ask Realtor with a Heart of Gold, to hear the latest real estate market update.”
“Alexa, ask Realtor with a Heart of Gold, sell my house in 72 hours."
“Alexa, do you know of a Realtor in Chapel Hill, North Carolina?”

We’re constantly updating and refining our skill’s functionality to keep track of home sales and the market. Have a comment, suggestion, or question, please reach out to us at yourehomesnc@gmail.com. Visit us at www.JackieLynaugh.com for the latest and greatest in real estate.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
